None.Name: Ground Bomb
None.Description: Every 4 seconds, unit fires a magma bomb that deals 270 damage to enemies in a 10m radius around its target, up to 420 in total. Knocks back small and medium units. Affects ground targets only.

None.Name: Air Defense
None.Description: Every 2 seconds, 8 turrets shoot independently dealing 60 damage to enemies in a 5m radius around its target, up to 85 in total. Affects air targets only.
